code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useLanguage}from'../components/Layout';import{Home}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotFound=()=>{const{language}=useLanguage();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-neutral-light text-center px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-9xl font-bold text-primary mb-4",children:"404"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-neutral-dark mb-6",children:language==='ar'?'الصفحة غير موجودة':'Page Not Found'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-neutral-dark/60 text-lg mb-8 max-w-md",children:language==='ar'?'عذراً، الصفحة التي تبحث عنها قد تكون نقلت أو حذفت.':'Sorry, the page you are looking for might have been moved or deleted.'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"inline-flex items-center gap-2 bg-primary text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-bold hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all hover:scale-105",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{size:20}),language==='ar'?'العودة للرئيسية':'Back to Home']})]});};export default NotFound;
